Summary: It was a black triangular shaped object with no sound at all. I was with 3 friends on the 12th floor of my building and they all saw it too.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pune
There were no other sightings in Pune on or around May 12th 2011
divs: Sighting Details 1.I was at the rooftop of my building with 3 of my friends. We were just passing the time chatting.I have always had a keen interest in ufo's. I was just looking at the stars when I saw the object and told my friends to look at it. The first thought that came to my mind was that it was a regular plane.It was too cloudy so we couldn't see once it went further.
